name: Lunar Lander (itch) (Jared Springer)
description: This is a game of Lunar Lander.  The player who controls the Lunar Lander will have to land the ship on the score zones on the mountain. However, you want to do it slow. If you land too fast, you will crash. Try to get as many points as you can before you run out of fuel. Once you run out of fuel, you will start over.
